TypeSignature.Value: public delegate bool SyncUpdateCallback(SyncFromAllServersEvent eventType, string targetServer, string sourceServer, SyncFromAllServersOperationException exception);
.class public auto ansi sealed SyncUpdateCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Function SyncUpdateCallback(eventType As SyncFromAllServersEvent, targetServer As String, sourceServer As String, exception As SyncFromAllServersOperationException) As Boolean
public delegate bool SyncUpdateCallback(SyncFromAllServersEvent eventType, System::String ^ targetServer, System::String ^ sourceServer, SyncFromAllServersOperationException ^ exception);
type SyncUpdateCallback = delegate of SyncFromAllServersEvent * string * string * SyncFromAllServersOperationException -> bool

param.name: eventType
param.span: 指定事件类型的 成员之一。

span.span: One of the members that specifies the type of event.

param.name: targetServer
param.span: 包含作为复制目标的服务器的 DNS 名称。

span.span: Contains the DNS name of the server that is the target of the replication.

param.span: 如果通知操作不使用此参数，则此参数将为 。

span.span: This parameter will be if it is not used by the notification.

param.name: sourceServer
param.span: 包含作为复制源的服务器的 DNS 名称。

span.span: Contains the DNS name of the server that is the source of the replication.

param.span: 如果通知操作不使用此参数，则此参数将为 。

span.span: This parameter will be if it is not used by the notification.

param.name: exception
param.span: 对象，它包含有关所有已发生的错误的附加信息。

span.span: A object that contains additional information about any error that has occurred.

param.span: 如果未发生错误，则此参数将为 。

span.span: This parameter will be if no error has occurred.

summary.span: 在复制同步期间接收事件通知。

span.span: Receives event notifications during a replica synchronization.

returns.span: 如果对 、 或 对象调用的 SyncReplicaFromAllServers 方法应继续，则为 ；如果 SyncReplicaFromAllServers 方法应终止，则为 。

span.span: if the SyncReplicaFromAllServers method invoked on a , or object should resume; if the SyncReplicaFromAllServers method should terminate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The 操作需要很长时间才能完成，并且可能会在服务器上失败。operation takes a long time to complete and potentially could fail on a server. 通过回调函数，应用程序可以指示 SyncReplicaFromAllServers 方法是否应继续执行。The callback function enables the application to indicate whether the SyncReplicaFromAllServers method should continue executing. 例如，应用程序可能返回 false 以终止For example, the application could return false to terminate 发生错误时执行。execution if an error occurs. 使用此功能的另一种情况是终止Another scenario in which this capability would be used is to terminate 在应用程序检测到某个目标服务器或源服务器对的同步已完成后执行。execution once the application detects that synchronization has completed for a certain target server or source server pair.
